Shall not men and women learn from God's great lesson book that He bestows His love, mercy, and grace on us every moment of our lives? How can man ignore the responsibilities which rest upon him? The sun, the moon, the stars, the solid rocks, the flowing stream, the broad, restless ocean--to them we would do well to take heed.--Manuscript 35, 1899. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. June 7, 1984
